Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EventGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ContainerId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Property '%4 %5' on device '%3' changed. This may affect the value of a property on device container %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EventGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ContainerId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="DeviceInstanceId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PropertyKeyGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="PropertyKeyPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EventGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: New device interface '%2' with interface class %3 has been registered.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EventGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="DeviceInterfaceId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InterfaceClassGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>
